name: push-analytics
description: A NodeJS service using Puppeteer to generate images and HTML to insert into an email
author: Hendrik de Graaf

scripts.test: yarn tsc --noEmit && TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node --test --require ts-node/register $(find ./src -name '*.test.ts')
scripts.test:watch: yarn tsc --noEmit && TS_NODE_FILES=true TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true node --test --watch --require ts-node/register $(find ./src -name '*.test.ts')
